subject: Re: Hiding cart and account icons

full_threads.body:
Hi Theo, 

Ok great thanks for the payment. 

We have now updated the booking form styling as requested. Let us know if you require any further changes.

Sure thing all done.

Sorry about that, I think I assumed it was a monthly bill for hosting since it's around the same amount and thought it was going to be debited automatically.

Let me know how you go with the acuity link.

Cheers,

Theo

Hi Theo, 

Can you please action the outstanding invoices and then we will start. Looks like you paid for one invoice, but there is another as well. Let us know if you need it resent.

Hi,

When do you expect to have this done?

Thanks

Theo

Hi Heath,

No worries have created an account with support@wpperk.com and password belance123

You can login here: https://secure.acuityscheduling.com/

I will pay the invoice now.

Thanks!

Theo

Hi Theo, 

Just the logins to the platform where the code is entered please. 

We will also send the invoice for pre-payment and then once processed we will get started.
That's works great! What details do you need?

Hi Theo, 

For the below changes it would be 30mins. Let me know if that works for you. 

I have also attached the outstanding invoice.

Hi Heath,

Here are the things we are looking to have done - can you please give me a quote:

1) Expand section booking section:



As opposed to:



2) All borders square (not rounded)



As opposed to rounded ones by default:



3) Changing the top similar to Stoffa



As opposed to:



How long would this take?

Thanks,

Theo

Hi Theo, 

Sure, we should be able to help with that. It will be an approximate 3-4hr task and ideally, we would need the logins to input the code and test on the fly. 

Did you want it identical to the Stoffa one or just to match the rest of your website?

Sure shoot it through.

Quick question:

We're looking to customize a bit our Booking system which requires CSS coding, is this something you can help with?

Basically just need to make borders on everything square, consistent font and stretch the appointment section on mobile. Pretty much exactly the same as per this one: https://stoffa.co/pages/showroom#book

We currently have this one: https://belance.com.au/visit-us/

We just need to put the code in here i think...

Hi Theo, 

Ok great, shout out if you need hand. 

Also, there's a note that there's an outstanding invoice from Nov last year. Did you need us to resend that?

All good I found out how to do it!

Cheers

Theo

Hi guys,

Just following on this please?

Theo

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:

We will put the shop section on hold for a bit.

How do we go about hiding the Cart and My Account section on the header as it's not needed at the moment?

Thanks,
